Reviews.Title: Item just as described...and with great customer service!
Reviews.Author: Eric John
Reviews.Content: My husband needed a flip phone to replace his old broken one...make a call, speakerphone, take a picture, he's happy.  They're not so easy to find these days, but this phone was exactly what he was looking for.  It has way more features than he needs, lots of ringers, pretty big number pad, email etc...he won't use half of it.  The phone is great, and he has no complaints other than the face plate is a little shiny for his taste, but big deal.  He loves that you can set the phone to answer or not answer when flipped open (his old phone would answer when you flipped it open to check the caller ID), and likes the clock on the face plate.  It's really thin and does what it should; it's a great basic phone.The seller was fantastic, he got the phone in the mail immediately so we could get it in time for Father's Day, and didn't mind communicating with me to let me know how long it would take or when he put it in the mail.  Recommend the phone and recommend the seller.  :)

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: dcfan
Reviews.Content: I loved the phone! It was just as described and I have had no problems with it. It is a simple phone that makes calls and text.

Reviews.Title: great service
Reviews.Author: FayRN
Reviews.Content: like new, absolutely wonderful service. the phone got here much faster than expected! Recommend this to everyone! Merry christmas everyone!

Reviews.Title: wonderful
Reviews.Author: Gerald
Reviews.Content: Got this phone today and was very pleased. I had a smart phone but wanted to cut back on expensives. It has everything I need and the seller was great getting it to me fast. Will buy again from seller if need arises.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: This is one of our favorite flip phones.  It was in excellent condition and works perfect.  It's actually better than some of the newer flip phones.

Reviews.Title: Replacement Phone...
Reviews.Author: Gipsy Lover "Amour du jour"
Reviews.Content: This is the best phone. My mom has my old one because it has the large buttons on keypad for her to see easy. That one quit working and I found this exact replacement here on Amazon. Joycells did a wonderful job in delivery. Mom loves it. She was so happy I found the same phone for her...brand new too.

Reviews.Title: Sanyo SCP-3810 Flip Phone
Reviews.Author: fander
Reviews.Content: This product is easy to operate. It provide the type of service needed in a cell phone. I would recommend this product and dealer to anyone needing a basic cell phone to keep in touch.

Reviews.Title: Sanyo SCP-3810 Flip phone rating
Reviews.Author: Sarah Fehrman
Reviews.Content: The phone was purchased for my father who had "worn out" a previous phone of the same model.  Although I did see the same phone on Amozon a few weeks prior to ordering this one for a cheaper price (about $20 cheaper...), the phone arrived at a very timely manner & in very good condition.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Johnathan Tillman
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my 86 year old Dad and he loves it!!! I recommend it. Great phone if you're looking for something to just receive and make calls.

Reviews.Title: Piece of s***
Reviews.Author: Rashida brooks
Reviews.Content: So I received a phone that was not advertised ! The phone is not even a sprint phone. It's an unlocked phone that sprint can't even activate. I wish amazon would give me my money back!

Reviews.Title: wanted my old phone back
Reviews.Author: girl with gr8 nails
Reviews.Content: my phone was stolen and had to upgrade when i went to replace it; didn't love my new phone it was awkward (as all new things tend to be at first) so i paid a ridiculous price for this phone b/c i Wanted it. it came with somebody's info on it (great did i buy a stolen phone?) and the battery barely lasts a day with out charging, o well live and learn times change go with the flow and stop trying to swim backwards against this technology wave
